about_the_game:
Embark on an epic adventure with Finding Fern, an immersive Action Adventure RPG that takes you on an epic story of discovery and excitement. Take a journey with Fern and Momo, across a world of mystery and intrigue, as they search for their mother.



As you travel through a vast, fantastical realm, you'll encounter a diverse cast of characters, both friend and foe. Engage in thrilling battles with powerful enemies, and acquire potent magical abilities to aid you on your quest.

With Finding Fern, you'll enjoy the freedom to switch between multiple party members at will, each with their unique play styles and abilities. You'll also have the opportunity to meet new allies along the way, expanding your party and enhancing your gameplay experience.



But Finding Fern isn't just about combat - it's a game that places a strong emphasis on story and dialogue. Your party members will engage in conversations with each other, as well as with the many fascinating individuals and creatures you encounter on your journey.

Get ready for an unforgettable adventure with Finding Fern. Explore a rich and immersive world, engage in thrilling battles, and uncover the truth behind Fern's quest to find her mother. With its unique gameplay mechanics, captivating story, and diverse cast of characters, Finding Fern has a little something for everyone.

short_description: Journey through a captivating world of mystery and intrigue in Finding Fern. This Action Adventure RPG features robust dialogue, engaging party interactions, and fast combat. Play as multiple party members, craft potions and food, and upgrade your abilities for a thrilling and unique adventure.
